Note

Click here to download the full example code or to run this example in your browser via Binder

Logging test¶

import logging
import sys


def _create_logger(name=None):
    logger = logging.getLogger(name=name)
    logger.setLevel(logging.INFO)
    sh = logging.StreamHandler(sys.stdout)
    sh.setLevel(logging.INFO)
    logger.addHandler(sh)
    return logger

logger = _create_logger("first_logger")
logger.info("is in the same cell")

Out:

is in the same cell

logger.info("is not in the same cell")

Out:

is not in the same cell

Total running time of the script: ( 0 minutes 0.002 seconds)

Download Python source code: plot_log.py

Download Jupyter notebook: plot_log.ipynb
